history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: ppcp,confl_restar. qsimpl time: 1 use: ppcp,confl_restar. qsimpl time: 1 use: eqp_spminusf_com,ppcp,confl_restar. qsimpl time: 1 use: eqp_spminusf_com,ppcp,confl_restar.

exceptions.tactic: apply (confl_restar A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppcp a b) c) in H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : divp (ppcp a b) c The term "ppcp a b" has type "poly A0 eqA ltM" while it is expected to have type "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)".

exceptions.tactic: apply (confl_restar A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppcp b a) c).
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), SpolyQ A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q -> forall p : poly A0 eqA ltM, ReduStarConfluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) A : Set A0 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop p : poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM A1 : A plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : divp (ppcp a b) c M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) The term "ppcp b a" has type "poly A0 eqA ltM" while it is expected to have type "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)".

exceptions.tactic: apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs _ n ltM ltM_dec).
exceptions.exn: In environment H2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), SpolyQ A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q -> forall p : poly A0 eqA ltM, ReduStarConfluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) A : Set A0 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop p : poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM A1 : A plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : divp (ppcp a b) c M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) H1 : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA ?eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec ?M4824 ?M4826 ?M4827 ?M4828 ?M4830) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA ?eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec ?M4825 ?M4826 ?M4827 ?M4829 ?M4830)" with "(let (x, x0) := p b a in match x as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> Prop) with | nil => fun (_ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil) (_ : poly A0 eqA ltM) => False | a :: l => fun (_ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: l)) (H'1 : poly A0 eqA ltM) => let (x0, x) := H'1 in match x0 as l0 return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l0 -> Prop) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => False | a0 :: l0 => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a0 :: l0) => divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a a0 end x end x0) c".

In environment H4 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), SpolyQ A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q -> forall p : poly A0 eqA ltM, ReduStarConfluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) A : Set A0 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop H0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZc : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c -> False) (p q r : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n p q -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a c -> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a c nZc p r) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b c nZc q r) p : poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM A1 : A plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : divp (ppcp a b) c M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) H1, H3 : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "divp (ppcp a b) c" with "divp (p b a) c".

original: intros a b c H. apply (confl_restar A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppcp a b) c) in H. apply (confl_restar A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppcp b a) c). apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs _ n ltM ltM_dec). apply H.
